Package com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.ui.pin

Interface SecurePinPadUiCallback

public interface SecurePinPadUiCallback
A callback that contains methods for managing PIN authentication.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    SecurePinPadUiCallback.Controller
    A callback to cancel the authentication.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    onEnterPin(SecurePinPad pinPad, ScenarioContext scenarioContext, SecurePinPadUiCallback.Controller controller)
    Called when a PIN authentication starts.
    default void
    setPin(boolean isChangePin, ScenarioContext scenarioContext, SetPinCallback setPinCallback)

  • Method Details

    • onEnterPin

      default void onEnterPin(@NonNull SecurePinPad pinPad, @NonNull ScenarioContext scenarioContext, @NonNull SecurePinPadUiCallback.Controller controller)
      Called when a PIN authentication starts.

      The developer should show pinPad to the user.
      This is an optional method. Implement this method to input the pin using pinPad.
      Parameters:
      pinPad - The secure PIN pad to show to the user.
      scenarioContext - The details of the authentication.
      controller - The callback to cancel the authentication.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - throws an exception when the implementation is not provided.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • setPin

      default void setPin(boolean isChangePin, @NonNull ScenarioContext scenarioContext, @NonNull SetPinCallback setPinCallback)
      Called when to set a PIN.

      This is an optional method. Implement this method to set the pin programmatically.
      Parameters:
      isChangePin - true during change pin operation, otherwise false.
      scenarioContext - The details of the authentication.
      setPinCallback - a callback to provide the pin.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - throws an exception when the implementation is not provided.
      Since:
      2.7.0
